name: There was nothing before the chaos came
name_original: There was nothing before the chaos came
description:
You are a god who must unlock new lands. With every cross you set, more pilgrims come and the world generates more resources for you. But in the first phase, you only need 10 children to believe in you and faith in you will grow.

Drag n Drop the Cross and build houses to gather the first 10 children.

The game has only 5 MB, so should be loaded immediately.

Short explanation:

The game was created for the Kindred Gamejam. After 5 years it's my first gamejam where I tried to deliver a real game. After 5 years you realize what you didn't get and where your limits are. 1 week time, a flu and several customers who urgently want to have something ready. It was a lot of fun and it was just as chaotic as the game got. 

A big thank you to Kindred and Jana for the great jam and Happy Birthday again!
